spatial_accuracy.notes: Significant deviations in window and door counts. The dining room bay window array (3 windows) is reduced to a single door. The living room side windows are misrepresented. Staircase orientation relative to the pantry is flipped or incorrectly truncated.

structural_fidelity.notes: The central 'Pantry' logic is failed; it has been rendered as a semi-open kitchen island structure rather than a distinct enclosed room. The playroom/kitchen wall segment is missing its doorway transition. Large exterior window groupings are consolidated incorrectly.

furniture_mapping.notes: Kitchen cabinetry follows the general L-shape and island concept, but the fireplace/foyer desk area is hallucinated as a generic block. Scale of the bathroom fixtures is disproportionately small.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Excellent isometric execution and neutral lighting. Geometry is clean and render noise is nonexistent. High visual clarity despite structural inaccuracy.

detected_errors.description: Missing multiple window units in the dining room and living room bay areas.
Incorrect placement of the entrance door relative to the foyer closet.
Hallucinated kitchen island configuration that ignores the enclosed pantry walls.
Proportion distortion of the staircase width and landing height compared to plan dimensions.
Orientation error in the swing direction of the interior bathroom and playroom doors.
